name: islandrift
description:
Control

1.Mouse
① Move to rotate the view
② To find the boosting shoe , unlock the boosting ability  and to hold left mouse button to boost forward . The longer you hold , the further boosting distance you will get . 
2.Space
Tap to fly . Flying will consume your energy . Make sure you get the supplementary battery to maintain flying abilitty.

Goal
1. Fly to the finish gate.
2. Find the purple crystal for extra credit !

Source code: https://github.com/mszezeb/islandrift

Level design & Scene composing: Honghao Zhu(597839942@qq.com)

UI design & Modeling: Deryan(970417359@qq.com)

Programming & Cheering & Submitting: mszezeb
